title: Business Strategy Practical Skill Enhancement: Target Language Intensive Training Program for Multilingual Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic target language comprehension and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply core grammatical structures of the target language with 80% accuracy in real-world tasks

Learners will select ≥3 communication strategies (e.g., keyword translation, visual aids) using their native language and a second language (English/Chinese) in multilingual work environments (English emails, video conferences, etc.) and achieve ≥80% performance in role-play assessments based on real scenarios.
Learners can draft and pitch professional documents in the target language through team-based projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
